    int
    joinGame(String nickname, int port, String ip)
    This method is called to join the game, if the controller added the player correctly it alerts the client and add it to the clients list, if the controller cannot add the player to the game (outcome=-1,-2,-3) it sends a message to the client with the corresponding error if the game has already started, or it has been loaded from file it will do a reconnect instead of a join

    this method is used to set the controller

    this method is called by clientRMI's function heartbeat() and it's used to set the last ping of the client that called it in clientsLobby map

    tryToStartLoadedGame()
    this method is used to check after the game has been loaded from json file if all the players are reconnected, in that case it sends the notifications that allow the players to start playing

  • Method Details

    • joinLobby

      public int joinLobby(String nickname, int port, String ip) throws RemoteException
      This method is called by ClientRMI to join a map Lobby, used to alert every ClientRMI waiting for a game to be created
      Specified by:
      joinLobby in interface RMIinterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - name of the player that wants to join the lobby
      port - used to connect to the rmi client
      Returns:
      0 if the player has been added to the map, -2 if something goes wrong with reconnect, -3 if the game has been created and the nickname does not correspond to one of the players in the game who are disconnected
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • joinGame

      public int joinGame(String nickname, int port, String ip) throws RemoteException
      This method is called to join the game, if the controller added the player correctly it alerts the client and add it to the clients list, if the controller cannot add the player to the game (outcome=-1,-2,-3) it sends a message to the client with the corresponding error if the game has already started, or it has been loaded from file it will do a reconnect instead of a join
      Specified by:
      joinGame in interface RMIinterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - name of the player that wants to join the game
      port - used to connect to the rmi client
      Returns:
      0 if the player has been added to the game, -1, -2, -3 if there has been an error in the joining of the game -4 means problems in reconnecting
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • isGameBeingCreated

      public boolean isGameBeingCreated() throws RemoteException
      this method is used to check if the game is being created
      Specified by:
      isGameBeingCreated in interface RMIinterface
      Returns:
      true if the game is being created by someone else, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • firstInLobby

      public boolean firstInLobby(String nickname) throws RemoteException
      this method is used to check if the selected player is the first in the lobby
      Specified by:
      firstInLobby in interface RMIinterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - name of the player
      Returns:
      true if the player is the first of the lobby, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • gameIsCreated

      public void gameIsCreated() throws RemoteException
      this method is called by Controller in createNewGame method when a new game is created. Calls method gameHasBeenCreated for every RMI client in clientsLobby Map
      Specified by:
      gameIsCreated in interface RMIinterface
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • createNewGame

      public boolean createNewGame(String nickname, int numOfPlayers, int port, String ip) throws RemoteException
      This method is called to create a new game that can host a number of player equals to numOfPlayers
      Specified by:
      createNewGame in interface RMIinterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - name of the player that is creating the match
      numOfPlayers - parameter indicating the number of players that can join the created game
      port - of the rmi client
      Returns:
      true if the game is created correctly, false if there are any problems and the game is not created
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • drawTilesFromBoard

      public List<Tile> drawTilesFromBoard(String playerNickname, int x, int y, int amount, Board.Direction direction) throws RemoteException
      This method is used to draw the tiles from the board
      Specified by:
      drawTilesFromBoard in interface RMIinterface
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - name of the player doing this action
      x - x coordinate on the board
      y - y coordinate on the board
      amount - number of tiles to draw
      direction - direction in which to draw
      Returns:
      the list of tiles drawn if the move is valid, if the move is not valid it returns null
      Throws:
      RemoteException

      Specified by:
      insertTilesInShelf in interface RMIinterface
      Parameters:
      playernickName - name of the player doing the action

    • endOfTurn

      public void endOfTurn(String playerNickname) throws RemoteException

      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the player whose turn is ending
      Throws:
      RemoteException

      public boolean reconnect(String playerNickname, int port, String ip) throws RemoteException

      Specified by:
      reconnect in interface RMIinterface
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - name of the player who is trying to reconnect
